About Medikit

Medikit helps you managing your Python (3.5+) projects, with various features. Unlike project generators like cookiecutter (wich it does not replace), Medikit is mostly used for files and assets maintenance through the project life (including things like generating releases, updating requirements, freeze requirements versions, etc.).

Other Formats

You can download the documentation in other formats as well:

  • as PDF
  • as zipped HTML
  • as EPUB
